mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM admin_auth WHERE name = #{name}
SELECT a.id, a.name, a.enabled, ra.id selected FROM admin_auth a LEFT JOIN admin_role_auth ra ON ra.role_id = #{roleId} AND ra.auth_id = a.id
SELECT a.id, a.name FROM admin_auth a LEFT JOIN admin_role_auth ra ON ra.auth_id = a.id LEFT JOIN admin_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = ra.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
